name: XStudio
description: The XStudio with it's symbol TXS is an NFT marketplace built to accommodate and facilitate the transactional evolution starting with NFT technologies. An NFT community represented by artists, NFT owners, investors, and art enthusiasts, around the benefits of putting art and collectibles on the blockchain via duel smart contracts. We are developing a decentralized marketplace of curated NFTs that are inherently connected to the Bitcoin blockchain and is currently on the Ethereum blockchain . TXS tokens will be used to participate in different staking options that we will launch with established artists on the platform. TXS tokens can be used as an investment item and can be exchanged for other cryptocurrencies on major exchange platforms
